oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Carter vs. Tipton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alfred M. Carter vs. James Tipton and others. [Carter County, TN]. Dispute over water, channels, land and mill. Mentions Doe River. Mentions early settlement of the area. Briefs and depositions, ca. 1840's with references back to 1797. No inherent order to the manuscripts. From the T.A.R. Nelson Papers in the McClung Historical Collection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Law & legal affairs; Mills; Rivers;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
